column3: @TheBlueMatt But #11604 doesn't touch `FindNode(…)` from what I can see? :-)
@TheBlueMatt Could you explain how #11604 overlaps with the `FindNode(…)` work in this PR? :-)

<!--5d09a71f8925f3f132321140b44b946d-->The last travis run for this pull request was 131 days ago and is thus outdated. To trigger a fresh travis build, this pull request should be closed and re-opened.

I think it's really confusing to require the lock for some functions, and forbid it for others.\n\nIt's also kinda a step in the wrong direction... ideally cs_vNodes wouldn't be held while using a Node*. Instead, it should just have its refcount increased for the duration of its use.
@sipa @theuni @promag Thanks for your input! Closing this PR due to lack of consensus ACK :-)
